item.title: Time To Drop The Ball.
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Welcome to Tedium. Here’s the first issue of the twice-weekly newsletter that’s bound to become the only email you readâ€”just in time for New Year’s Day. And in honor of everyone’s favorite hangover catalyst, we’re gonna tell you some crazy crap about the first holiday of the year, as well as the holiday that bookends it. May your internet be functional as you scroll through this message on your electronic reading device of choice.
